text: Super 30 is an 2019 Indian Hindi-language biographical drama movie. It was co- produced and directed by Vikas Bahl. It is based on the life of mathematician Anand Kumar and his educational program Super 30. The movie stars Hrithik Roshan as Kumar and Mrunal Thakur. The soundtrack was composed by Ajay-Atul. The movie was co-produced by Ahmed Khan. Sajid Nadiadwala's production house Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment and Reliance Entertainment. The principal photography of the movie began in February 2018. The movie was also shot for 10 days in Sambhar Lake Town which will be shown as Kota, Rajasthan. Super 30 was released on 12 July 2019. Super 30 is Phantom Films's last production. It is based on the life of Anand Kumar, an Indian math teacher from the 1970s. ==Cast== * Hrithik Roshan as Anand Kumar * Virendra Saxena as Rajendra Kumar (Anand Kumar's father) * Mrunal Thakur as Rithu Rashmi * Nandish Singh as Pranav Kumar * Pankaj Tripathi * Amit Sadh as narrator == Controversy == After Anand Kumar was accused of fraud, the makers of upcoming movie Super 30 decided to not call their movie a biopic anymore. Super 30 will be the last movie of Phantom Films. The production house has been dissolved because director Vikas Bahl was accused of sexual misconduct by actress Nayani Dixit and a Phantom employee. This will be the last project of Phantom Films. == Soundtrack == Ajay Atul was the music composer for the film and Amitabh Bhattacharya wrote the lyrics for the songs. Vipin Nair of The Hindu rated the soundtrack 3.5/5, calling it a "pretty engaging soundtrack ". The Times of India based Debarati Sen, in her review, said the composers "do not fail to impress". ==References== ==Other websites== * *super 30 at Bollywood Hungama * * * Category:2010s Indian movies Category:2019 movies Category:2010s drama movies
title: Super 30 (movie)
